bug.author: wangzy0327
bug.summary: class ContainerOp(BaseOp):def container(self): no parent() function
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>@Property</denchmark-h>
| def container(self): | """Container object that represents the container property in | io.argoproj.workflow.v1alpha1.Template. Can be used to update the | container configurations. | | Example: | import kfp.dsl as dsl | from kubernetes.client.models import V1EnvVar | | @dsl.pipeline(name='example_pipeline') | def immediate_value_pipeline(): | op1 = (dsl.ContainerOp(name='example', image='nginx:alpine') | .container | .add_env_variable(V1EnvVar(name='HOST', value='foo.bar')) | .add_env_variable(V1EnvVar(name='PORT', value='80')) | .parent # return the parent ContainerOp | ) | """ | return self._container
